result.execSummary:
The defendant Charles J Marksman Jr was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Payment plan of $25.00/month commencing 11/01/2022

8:46 AM Defendant Charles J Marksman Jr in court.  Attorney Solomon H Gatton in court for Charles J Marksman Jr.  Attorney Rebecca Meyer in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Court cancels warrant.
Parties will proceed to plea/sentencing today. 
State recommending 60 days Jail, Defense free to argue. 
Deft pleads No Contest to Count 1 - Court finds Guilty.
Atty Gatton notes negotiations were for 30 days Jail - State agrees.
State makes sentencing argument. 
Defense makes argument for less Jail time. 1 day Credit.
Deft makes statement to Court.
Court orders 30 days Jail with Huber for work, treatment and counseling release. 1 day Credit. To report by 10/25/2022.
Payment plan of $25.00/month commencing 11/01/2022
Plea/sentencing hearing on September 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Return on warrant on September 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Jury Instruction

3:53 PM Defendant Charles J Marksman Jr not in court.  Attorney Solomon H Gatton appeared by phone for Charles J Marksman Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Rebecca Meyer in court for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Gatton has no explanation for the defendant's non appearance. The court previously addressed this same bond issue.  The court issues a bench warrant and removes future date.  Compliance w/victim's rights is not needed in this case.
Bail/bond hearing on September 7, 2022 at 03:45 pm.
